context: Comprehensive test covering all major skill instructions: friendly greeting, ecosystem introduction, 5-language support with English default, personalization, time-of-day awareness, config-driven strings, and tile suggestions.

checklist.name: Friendly greeting
checklist.description: The page displays a greeting containing at least ONE of: 'Hello', 'Welcome', 'Hi' or their translations

checklist.name: Five languages
checklist.description: The config or code includes greeting support for exactly 5 languages: en, fr, es, de, ja

checklist.name: English default
checklist.description: English is set as the default or fallback language in config or code

checklist.name: Name personalization
checklist.description: The page includes a mechanism to accept a user's name (input field, URL param, or prompt) and display it in the greeting

checklist.name: Time-of-day logic
checklist.description: The JavaScript detects the current time and varies the greeting for at least morning vs. afternoon vs. evening

checklist.name: Mentions tiles
checklist.description: The page content or generated greeting mentions 'tiles' as a concept in the ecosystem

checklist.name: Mentions skills
checklist.description: The page content or generated greeting mentions 'skills' as a concept in the ecosystem

checklist.name: Related tile suggestions
checklist.description: The page includes a section or list suggesting related tiles, packages, or resources to explore

checklist.name: Config-driven strings
checklist.description: Greeting strings are stored in config.json and loaded dynamically, not hardcoded in HTML or app.js

checklist.name: Tessl ecosystem reference
checklist.description: The greeting or page content mentions 'Tessl' by name as the ecosystem or platform
